comment: Prof. Cross is retiring after this semester. However, I wanted to put a review of her as a Professor. She is quick to respond to any inquiries. Just plan to do a lot of reading, discussion posts, and two group projects. The material is a piece of cake, but it's just a little time consuming. You'll be fine.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Cross was pretty straight forward.  Not tons of homework.  All quizzes and tests were done thru Chicago Business Press.  Weekly discussion and reply required.  2 group projects, but were pretty easy as far as group projects go.  Random assigned groups,  no lockdown browser.

Professor Cross is very very friendly! She always sends email updates and you can tell shes just a genuine person who cares about her students. Very simple assignements, a few quizzes, discussions, and exams. The usual and I would 100% take her again!
Was two weeks late to respond to email and when she finally got back to me I still had to go to the head of the department just to get my questions answered. Not helpful, DO NOT TAKE HER.

The class overall is easy. 3 tests are easy, weekly quizzes that take no more than 10 minutes to do (all multiple choice 10 questions). 10 discussion boards to do which is not bad. The group projects kinda stink. I had a group that didnt do squat and I had to do all the work, cause Cross said we were grown and to figure it out, so that kinda sucked
Such an amazing professor! She is a lenient grader as long as you do the work. The workload was completely doable and the class itself was interesting.

You MUST have the book for this class! Love this professor. She is so kind and truly cares about her students. 3 tests, 2 team assignments, 10 discussions, 14 quizzes. I actually learned a lot in this course and the content was actually quite interesting. If you study, read the textbook, and go through the course content - you'll get an A easily!

Great Prof lots of experience lived abroad speaks French. Really enjoyed this class & going to different businesses & speaking with top C Suite execs. Pay attention and make connections. Do not think you will coast in the scholars program! Intro is easy on purpose it still takes effort & this is a once in a lifetime opportunity so use it wisely!
Discussions, 2 Group projects and 3 tests that are all curved. Groups are assigned by prof, but the 2 projects are still fairly easy to do.

Cross is so organized and cares for her students. If you can self manage, this online class will be a breeze. The group project was not difficult, and the two tests were easy as well. You will be completing LearnSmarts each week and a discussion post - these can become tedious but not at all difficult. Great intro class
Does not respond to emails in timely manner. Waits until the deadline is over until responding to students' questions. Very unprofessional and rude behavior.

Such a wonderful teacher! Not only do you learn the objectives for the class, but you learn other inspirational information that also changes your personal life. She is amazing and wants you to be successful. One of the best educators at the school!

Easy class. 3 discussion posts every week. 1 group project at the end of the semester and three tests which are non cumulative. She takes attendance randomly which gives the Students present in class  extra credit. She is a fair grader and exams are pretty easy. Make sure to read the materials before class.

The class is based off of 3 exams, a group presentation, and 10 discussion posts. Pick a good group cus you will work with them all semester. Likes in class activities about anything. The test questions come from anything (follow study guides and good news topics). Expects you to read textbook and watch videos on your own before class.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--TEST HEAVY--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Professor Cross was great for the online class. She responded quickly, made sure we were aware of the assignments and due dates, and had a simple group project. Class is pretty easy if you do the usual weekly posts and quizzes.

Professor Cross was wonderful.  I took the class online.  I must say, if I get the chance to take her again I would.  There is a quiz for every chapter, two exams, and a project.  You must take her she is great you will not regret it!
Prof. Cross was my internship professor. Do your work, and you'll pass.

Take Her!!! She has been one of the best teachers I have had here at KSU. There is one group project that isn't due til the end of the semester. You can take the quizzes anytime you want and gives you 2 hours to do it, there is one for every chapter. The tests are not bad and there is a group discussion over topics covered in class. Easy A.

Professor Cross is such a sweetheart. I loved taking her for MGT 3100. Took this course online. There were: 1 midterm and 1 final exam (online), weekly discussions, online learning modules for each chapter, and a group project. She really wants her students to succeed and understand the material. Take her!!
Weekly discussions, online connect modules, 1 group project that was super fun and 2 exams! Such an easy class if you keep up with the easy discussions and modules. Would definitely take again!!

I've taken 2 different classes from this professor.  Very straight forward.  No surprises.  Reasonable work load.  She likes group projects which can be challenging for an online class - I would definately take ANY course she was teaching.

Ms. Cross is clear, attentive, helpful, and straightforward.  The tests are not easy but are manageable.  The project is also doable, but make sure you read all of the project related information early in the semester.  Great class!  I'd take another with Ms. Cross!

Took this class online and really enjoyed it. Prof Cross is awesome. She is very helpful, her expectations are clear, and she is fair. She communicates with students a lot and you can tell she is passionate and interested about students learning.
very nice professor.
She is great.
Prof Cross is very approachable.  Wants to see students succeed.  Applies bus. principles to real life scenarios.  Study the study guide and you'll do well on exams.

Awesome Online Professor...You can take the quizzes as many times needed to get a perfect score. She is very helpful and will respond quickly. The final is hard but do the discussions and assignments and the quizzes and you will do fine.

I LOVED professor Cross. The most adorable professor I've ever had. Not only did she keep class interesting but you can also tell that she genuinely loves her job. Go to class. Pay attention. Do your assignments. You will get an A.

This is my favorite class mostly because of prof cross. She is sweet/helpful/engaging. Take her if you have the chance you will not regret it! Not too much work but if you like classes that only have tests then maybe you should reconsider. I am not a good test taker so I like the online HW grades you can do it until you get it right :D

I took her online. The class is entertaining, relates to real life and she is easy going. There are weekly discussion posts, if you post 3 relevant messages, you get 100% every week. You can retake the quizzes as many times as you wish, and the tests are fair. The final is a bit tricky. Study and do good on the rest and you'll get an A

Absolute pleasure going to her class and listening to her speak. Very engaging and experienced. Tests were so easy and she grades fairly (if not leniently). I got tired of weekly discussion posts and massive Homework Manager assignments. But she has to be the best option for this course. Take her if you can grab a seat!

Great professor! Took her for maymester, and though the days were long, she had enjoyable lectures and activities, plus a couple of speakers.  Grading was pretty lenient, and the only significantly difficult parts were the tests, but they're not impossible or anything.  Had her once before and she's still a great experience, definitely take her!

Professor Cross is a joy to have as a teacher.  She knows her material and adds lots of interest to the class in the way of personal experiences, relative videos and guest speakers.  If I were in the management curriculum I would try to take ALL my classes from her.
She is awesome. VERY fair professor and has lots of real world experience to add to the class. Easy A if you do assignments and put fourth EFFORT.
Very easy teacher. Only has a midterm and and final and a small group project that was also very easy. She also uses the show "The Office" to portray management terms. Take her!!!

My 2nd time taking her for a management course and I'd take her for more if she taught them! Took 3100 in class and 4160 online and both were easy chapter quizzes, one midterm, one final, one paper/project. Take her if you can get her class!

Professor Cross is great! She is so nice and knows her stuff! Classes were full of pointless note-taking and watching videos. I never went to class and still made an A. There was a group project that was super easy. I definitely recommend this professor!!!

Excellent introductory course to management. The workload was a bit excessive at times, namely the new LearnSmart modules, but it was easy to get high score on everything and she was generous with grades. Put forth the effort, and you will most likely get an A.

very sweet lady but not such a great professor. If you actually want to learn something, I suggest taking someone else. There is a midterm, a final and a small group project. Final and Midterm are really hard compared to what she "teaches". If you like to watch the office or some other video every class, this class is for you!
Great professor. Midterm, final,and one 3-5 page paper. She's passionate about her craft and makes class interesting. Take her, you won't regret it.

Professor Cross is great. This was my first on-line class and I had a very good experience. Do the discussions, they are not difficult. There's a quiz for each chapter in the book, but you can take the quizzes many time to get the best grade. There is also Mid-term (hard), a 3-5 pg paper, and a final. Do the work, easy A.

Dont listen to the MKTG 4160 on 7/19 dude, she doesnt even teach marketing so he obviously doesnt know what he is talking about. She is amazing. the quizzes online can be time consuming but you get unlimited tries. very fair tests and if she gives you a bad test she will curve it. (my class got a 23 point curve on the midterm)
Good professor. Easy tests, easy project, easy A. Great class to take. I highly recommend her.
Most interesting class I have taken @ KSU. Only thing that would have made this class better was taking it in person. Online is ok. Work load is fair. Follow the syllabus explicitly.

Easy online class.  M/C quiz for each chapter that you can take repeatedly, attempt with highest grade counts.  Discussion each week - 3 posts required.  One paper, 3-5 pages.  Midterm was tough, but it was open book and you had 3 days to complete.  Final was 50 M/C over last half of class - easy questions.  Put in the effort and you can get an A.

Horrible professor. Tests are crazy tuff and are not what is taught in class. Professor does not help students when they have questions and she talks to you like your stupid if you ask a question in class.
Worst Professor ever. Is not willing to help students. She is full of herself and unwilling to help students with anything that would involve her actually doing work.
Professor Cross is great! She's extremely organized and helpful. Her online class is put together so you can work ahead if you like. I highly recommend!
Cross is the best, period.
10 quizzes, 3 tests, and 5 discussions. Very straightforward.  Be warned for all non business majors, Dr. Cross is very fair but not easy.

Professor Cross was recommended to me and I am recommending her to anyone who needs to take this course.  I took it as an online class, but would have also enjoyed it if I had to attend class.  She is very helpful and  responds very quickly to emails.  I got an A out of the class.  Take her for any class you can get her for.

Excellent Professor! Take her if you can. Attendance is not mandatory, but will earn you a few extra points. Tests questions come from the textbook and quizzes. No surprises, and you will enjoy the class.

U can never go wrong with Ms. Cross! Very easy, fun, lively & interactive class. Begin ur chapter quizzes at the beginning of the semester & finish 'em. Participate in the weekly discussions (just 3 posts) go 2 class, revise ur notes and u'll be FINE!!! She rocks!!!

Very, very, very easy professor. Watches videos almost everyday. Easy grading system. No attendance. Can be very flighty. For our class, required a volunteer project that was very disorganized through SIFE, this was only downside, very stressful, but got grade due to easy grading.
Super Easy!  Great Teacher!

Great teacher, very helpful and understanding.  Tests are easy and straight from the book.  There are weekly discussions and quizzes to do.  Attendance isn’t mandatory but she sometimes gives extra credit.  Got to watch some movies too.

She is great. Everything everyone else said on here is true. Take this teacher if you have the chance. She let us decide the format of the tests and how many questions there would be. Very nice and knowledgeable lady.
Very energetic, has a vast knowledge, provides good real-life example of mngt terms and often presents class with movies that relate to the topic.

one of the most independent on-line courses taken.  Cross posted quizzes and class had until last day to take them as often as needed to get the best grade possible (question do change each time).  she posted tests and gave a week to complete, more than enough time.  make sure to join discussions!  she likes those! very informative class.
Great professor - loves her job.
Very Energetic teacher...very responsive to students.  Watch very funny and entertaining videos too about management.  Does NOT teach off of slides!!  Will take one of her classes again...
She makes class enjoyable, gives u every chance in the world to do good. Awesome teacher
This semester is the third time I've taken Ms. Cross for a class. 'Nough said.
Very boring teacher, but then again the topic is pretty dull.  She just reads from the slides and flips through the book for reviews

Awesome Teacher! She no longer uses slides. She skims over the chapter, straight from the book and brings videos occationally. There are no homework assignments, only quizes on web ct which are EASY 100s. Only 3 tests. Went to class about 20% of the time and made an A. Take her for this class!
I NEVER went to class except for test days. I got a "B". Can't complain about that!
Terrible teacher!  She expects to just read off the slides that she doesnt even write.  They are the publishers.  This class sucks.  Don't take this teacher!
Take your own notes.  Atleast you can skip class often and self-study.  Tests are easy if you read the chapters.
she sucks but you can pass the class if you study hard she doesn't explain anything you have to read the material and try to understand it by yourself
Tests are sometimes hard and sometimes easy. Tests non-cumulative.  Class is boring but not hard.  No homework 3 tests.  If you look slides over you will pass.
